message.name: ERR_FV_NAME_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A name must be entered for the federal allowable component.

message.name: ERR_FV_COUNTABLE_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A countable type must be entered for the federal allowable component.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A start date must be entered for the federal allowable component.

message.name: ERR_XFV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_EARLIER_THAN_END_DATE
message.locale: The start date must be earlier than the end date for the federal allowable component.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PROJECTION_AND_CA_CLIENT_PAID_STATUS_NOT_PAID
message.locale: The Projection Allowed indicator can only be selected if the Client Paid status is 'Paid'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ACTIVITY_ALREADY_LINKED_TO_FEDERAL_COMPONENT
message.locale: The Federal Allowable Component, %1s, is already linked to this %2c.

message.name: ERR_XRV_NAME_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: The Federal Allowable Component, %1s, already exists.

message.name: ERR_FV_RELATED_ID_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: You must select the service to be added to this federal allowable component.

message.name: ERR_FV_RELATED_TYPE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A related type must be set for the linked related record for the federal allowable component link.

message.name: ERR_FV_FEDERAL_ALLOWABLE_COMPONENT_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: A federal allowable component must be set for the federal allowable component link.

message.name: ERR_FV_FEDERAL_ALLOWABLE_COMPONENT_END_DATED_CANNOT_LINK
message.locale: The activity cannot be linked to the %1s federal allowable component, as it has an end date in the past.

message.name: ERR_FV_FEDERAL_ALLOWABLE_COMPONENT_CANCELLED_CANNOT_LINK
message.locale: The %1s federal allowable component is in a 'Cancelled' state, an activity cannot be linked to a federal allowable component in a 'Cancelled' state.

message.name: ERR_FV_SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_RELATED
message.locale: At least one %1c must be selected.
